tool_description: Search main tourist attractions in all Brazilian cities.
name: Brazil Attractions API
title: Brazil Attractions API

api_list.name: buscaDetalhePorVegetacao
api_list.description:
StartFragment

Lista detalhes das cidades pela vegetação

EndFragment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brazil-attractions-api1.p.rapidapi.com/brazil/cities/details/vegetation/floresta"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brazil-attractions-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://brazil-attractions-api1.p.rapidapi.com/brazil/cities/details/vegetation/floresta"

api_list.name: buscaDetalhePorMesDaTemporada
api_list.description:

Lista cidades pelo mês desejado pela temporada (tanto alta quanto baixa)

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brazil-attractions-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
